title: Samurai (1987) Vol. 2 complete Barry Blair & Pat McEown
description:
Finally, it took me a while to scan and edit since it was in color (I only feel comfortable with the B&W comics I've been scanning)

but here is vol. 2 of Samurai by Barry Blair. it only ran for three issues and it was followed-up with a 7-issue Vol. 3 (which I have not scanned as of yet)

Hotachi Kimura, the clone of the original Samurai, is trying hard to make a life for himself with the paramilitary organization Splinter, but itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s definitely not going as well as heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d hoped. In fact, the groupÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s leader, Velvet Black, pretty much fired him after his first major assignment. That doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t leave many options for a guy whose memories all belong to someone else, and whose entire life has been designed to make him the ultimate assassin.

To all those who left me props on my original torrent of Vol. 1...Many Thank

Enjoy and Seed.
